name: Seedcom
description:
Seedcom is a venture capital firm that invests in companies primarily in Vietnam. It invests in Tech companies operating in sectors such as Consumer Digital, Enterprise Tech, Fashion Tech, and E-Commerce. Notable portfolio companies include Haravan, KiotViet, Eway, and Juno.

We are a diverse and cohesive group of companies in the fields of technology, retail, services and production led by a team that commits to creating a difference for Vietnam.

We are the first company to adopt the 'new retail' model in Vietnam, and we will continue learning and applying breakthrough technologies to deliver excellent customer experiences.
